title: Woman & Sea
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Mark bottom margin in pencil: [Woman and Sea Rikio Taka
description: wavy vertical purple form at center with underlapping green stripe, wavy black overlapping line, and black circle; irregular, organic white form in background, sky-blue form overlaps at L from top to bottom, with curving dark blue element and yellow form at far L; peach background at R; bright red rectangle LLQ overlaps purple form, with intaglio waves and circle
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
